title: BE A PERMANENT IMM COIN HOLDER
content: IMM Coin is represented by Interday Market Management Limited, IMM Coin is the only currency used across IMM platform. Every purchase, sale exchange or any other transaction on the platform will require the use of IMM Coin. It will be used across the IMM platform, and will not be limited by the platform in the future. IMM Coin will be used.

title: MONTHLY PROFIT SHARING
content: Investor will have Monthly profit sharing of minimum 8% from every IMM Coin purchased.

title: BUY BACK AND BURN USING EDUCATIONAL PROFITS
content: Every 3 months we take 50% of the net profits from educational income and buy back IMM Coin from anyone who wants to sell them. Each Coin we buy back we permanently burn.This increase IMM Coin scarcity and increase it's value over time. The remaining 50% of profits is reinvested into further development to increasing the buy back budget.
